Title: Crime & Punishment
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Justin Noble, Jessica Polonsky, David Phillips (executive story editor), Justin Noble (executive story editor), Carly Hallam (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Jake and Rosa are framed for a crime they didn't commit.
